headline.main: LITVINOFF'S MISSION VITAL WAR FACTOR; He and Steinhardt to Start From Kuibyshev Together Today for Washington THEY KNOW SUPPLY NEEDS Russia's Steady Punishing of Nazis and Japan's Status Are Points in New Envoy's Task

lead_paragraph: KUIBYSHEV, Russia, Nov. 9 -- Maxim M. Litvinoff will leave here for Washington tomorrow to assume his new post as Soviet Ambassador, accompanied by Ambassador Laurence A. Steinhardt, who is returning to the United States on leave and for consultation with President Roosevelt and the State Department.
abstract: to leave Kuibyshev for Teheran en route to Wash
